current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To suspend the fiscal year 2013 sequester and establish
		  limits on war-related spending.

sponsor.#tail:
introduced the
			 following bill; which was read the first time

action-desc.#text:
Read the second time and placed on the
			 calendar

Read the second time and placed on the
		  calendar

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985/s:251

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
251A of the Balanced
			 Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985/s:251A
Consolidated and Furthering Continuing Appropriations Act, 2013/s:3001

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: , and any sequestration order issued by the
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
3004 of the Consolidated and Further Continuing
			 Appropriations Act, 2013
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Consolidated and Further Continuing Appropriations Act, 2013/s:3004

text.#text:
Notwithstanding the
			 sequestration order issued by the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
, there shall be available for the Federal Government for fiscal
			 year 2013 the amount that would have been made available for the Federal
			 Government for fiscal year 2013 but for

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
section 251A(7)(A) of
			 the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985/s:251A/p:7/sp:A

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Section 251 of the
			 Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985/s:251
Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985/s:251/ss:a
Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985/s:251/ss:a/p:2

text.#text:
Each nonexempt account within a category shall be reduced
				by a dollar amount calculated by multiplying the enacted level of sequesterable
				budgetary resources in that account at that time by the uniform percentage
				necessary to eliminate a breach within that category.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall be counted in
				determining whether a breach has occurred in the security
				category.
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985/s:251/ss:b/p:2/sp:E

text.#text:
Any amount of budget authority for overseas
				contingency operations and related activities for fiscal years 2014 through
				2016 in excess of the levels set in

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985/s:251/ss:b/p:2
Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985/s:251/ss:b/p:2/sp:A/cl:ii

text.#text:
by inserting at
			 the end the following:

for fiscal year
				2014, $92,289,000,000 in additional new budget authority;

for fiscal year
				2015, $37,283,000,000 in additional new budget authority; and

for fiscal year
				2016, $37,283,000,000 in additional new budget
				authority.

header.#text:
Overseas
				contingency operations/global war on terrorism

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
designates for Overseas Contingency Operations/Global War on
				Terrorism in statute on an account by account basis, the adjustment for the
				fiscal year shall be the total of such appropriations for the fiscal year in
				discretionary accounts designated as being for Overseas Contingency
				Operations/Global War on Terrorism, but not to exceed—

text.#text:
If, for fiscal
				years 2014 through 2016, appropriations for discretionary accounts are enacted
				that
